item.description:
• Join the Backyard Organic Gardeners group for aSeed Swap.

  • From Jean with http://www.garden-sense.com/ :

  • Bring whatever you have, small plastic snack size bags, labeler or whatever you have to put seeds in from others or yourself. Please let me know if you can't make meet up, I'll cancel if the weather is bad and it's not safe to travel. Please email me at my personal email address for more info as I don't check this site very often. Let me know if you have any questions.

    Great question under conversations...what happens if you want to come and don't have any seeds...come anyway...!

    Too many seeds? Bring your seed packages and swap with other people seeds you can't use.

    Clarification on cost: $5 per Meetup meeting or you can choose $20 for the season from March to October...once you reach $20 paid for the season, rest of the season will be no charge so 4 Meetups attended will pay your season dues.

    Feel free to bring a guest but please let me know, thanks...looking forward to meeting new gardeners and swapping seeds and garden ideas.

    Jean
item.how_to_find_us: Exit off Rte 128/95, Salem St towards Wakefield, left on Chapman Rd to end, right on Aldrish and right onto Louise Ave (dead end sign)
item.name: Get Ready for Spring with a Garden/Flower Seed Swap! $5
